column4: (The maids laugh at your mumbles and try to cheer you up.)
(A maid comes close to you with a large wooden paddle.)  I'm first today?  Sweet!  Show me your butt.
(She lightly hits your butt with the paddle and giggle.)  Welcome to the sorority!
(She gives the paddle to another maid which steps forward.)  My turn!
(She gives the paddle to another maid which steps forward.)  My turn!
(She swings the paddle on the same spot as before.)  Right on!  Welcome sister.
(She tosses the flogging device to another maid.)  Don't worry, this won't hurt me.
(She tosses the flogging device to another maid.)  Don't worry, this won't hurt me.
(She wacks your butt pretty good and laughs.)  One of us!
(You try to dodge but she hits you easily and laughs.)  Nice try sis!
(Another maid picks the paddle.)  Don't cry little sister, it will be over soon.
(Another maid picks the paddle.)  We have a tough cookie here sisters!
(She swings a pretty mean one that stings right on impact.)  Sisters in pain, sisters for life!
(They catch you before you fall and another one picks the paddle.)  Be strong, this is the last one.
(Another maid picks the paddle and smiles.)  You're a pro sis, this is the last one.

column3: (Close your eyes and prepare for impact.)
column4: (She smashes the paddle with strength, almost making you fall.)  You've did it!  Welcome to the maid sorority!

column3: (Whimper and try to beg for mercy.)
column4: (She smashes the paddle with strength, almost making you fall.)  You've did it!  Welcome to the maid sorority!

column3: (Defy them and present your butt proudly.)
column4: (She smashes the paddle with strength, almost making you fall.)  You've did it!  Welcome to the maid sorority!
